name: GetBankTransactions
description:
Retrieve all transaction details for a bank account.

Use this tool to obtain detailed information about all transactions involved in a specific bank account. It is helpful for financial analysis and record-keeping.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: A unique ID representing the organization for which transactions are being queried. This is required to specify the context of the request.

value_schema.description: ID of the organization

parameters.name: bank_account_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the bank account to retrieve transactions for.

parameters.name: transaction_type_filter
parameters.description: Specify the type of transactions to retrieve. Expected as a string, e.g., 'expense', 'income'.

parameters.name: transaction_date_range
parameters.description: Specify the start and end date for the transaction date range. Use 'date_start' for the start and 'date_end' for the end date.

value_schema.description: Start and end date, to provide a range within which the transaction date exist. Variants: date_start and date_end

parameters.name: transaction_amount_range
parameters.description: Set a range of transaction amounts to filter transactions. Use two numbers: start amount, end amount.

value_schema.description: Start and end amount, to provide a range within which the transaction amount exist. Variants: amount_start and amount_end

parameters.name: transaction_status_list_view
parameters.description: Filter transactions by status: all, uncategorized, manually_added, matched, excluded, categorized.

value_schema.description: Transaction status wise list view - All, uncategorized, manually_added, matched, excluded, categorized

parameters.name: transaction_reference_number
parameters.description: Search for a transaction using its reference number for more precise results.

value_schema.description: Search using Reference Number of the transaction

parameters.name: transaction_filter_type
parameters.description: Filter transactions by type: Status.All, Status.Uncategorized, Status.Categorized, Status.ManuallyAdded, Status.Excluded, Status.Matched.

value_schema.description: Filters the transactions based on the allowed types. Allowed Values: Status.All, Status.Uncategorized, Status.Categorized, Status.ManuallyAdded, Status.Excluded and Status.Matched.

parameters.name: sort_transactions_by
parameters.description: Specify how to sort transactions. Allowed value: 'date'.

value_schema.description: Sorts the transactions based on the allowed sort types. Allowed Values: date.

parameters.name: transaction_status_filter
parameters.description: Filter transactions by status: All, uncategorized, manually_added, matched, excluded, categorized.

value_schema.description: Transaction status wise list view - All, uncategorized, manually_added, matched, excluded, categorized

parameters.name: search_transactions_by_text
parameters.description: Search transactions using contact name or transaction description.

value_schema.description: Search Transactions by contact name or description

parameters.name: transaction_page_number
parameters.description: Page number of transactions to fetch, with a default value of 1. Used for pagination.

value_schema.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of transaction records to fetch per page. Default is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.
